attributes.action: Make MPs cancel “summer recess” until they resolve BREXIT and got an agreement
attributes.additional_details: Brexit: Withdrawal Agreement Bill 'should include public vote' https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-48319757
attributes.background: MPs need to get on with the job and resolve BREXIT once and for all. They should not have any breaks for holidays until this is resolved. The UK is in chaos and they should now serve the country and come to a decision
